In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts l, n : nat i, j : state C : tpc_coh (getStatelet i l) C' : tpc_coh (getStatelet j l) pf : n \\in nodes H : n \\in pts H0 : getLocal n (getStatelet j l) = getLocal n (getStatelet i l) Unable to unify "getStC ?M1908 = getStC ?M1907" with "getStP C' pf = getStP C pf".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
l: Ordered.sort Label
n: Equality.sort nat_eqType
j: state
i: state
C: TPCCoh (getStatelet i l)
C': TPCCoh (getStatelet j l)
pf: is_true (n \in nodes)

Goal:
n \in pts -> getLocal n (getStatelet j l) = getLocal n (getStatelet i l) -> getStP C' pf = getStP C pf

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
TPCCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive ordering; _ : transitive ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type) (c : class_of T), mixin_of (EqType T (base c)). Record type : Type := Pack {
Notation seq := list
getStP : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> PStateT
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
Module Equality := Struct Definition block : forall A : Type, A -> A. Parameter JMeq_eq_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), JMeq_eq JMeq_refl = erefl x. Parameter UIP_refl_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), UIP_refl A x (erefl x) = erefl (erefl x). Parameter inj_pairT2_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (P : A -> Type) (p : P x), inj_pairT2 A P x p p (erefl (existT P x p)) = erefl p. Record DependentEliminationPackage (A : Type) : Type := Build_DependentEliminationPackage { elim_type : Type; elim :
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
nodes = [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : seq nid
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] ->...-> ?T'] ?x : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label n : nat_eqType i : state j : state C : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) C' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) pf : n \in nodes |- ?T'] ?s : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label n : nat_eqType i : state j : state C : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) C' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) pf : n \in nodes |- seq ?T]
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label n : nat_eqType i : state j : state C : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) C' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) pf : n \in nodes |- Type] ?P : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label n : nat_eqType i : state j : state C : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) C' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) pf : n \in nodes |- ?A -> Type]
getStCE : forall (l : Label) (i j : state) (pf : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l)) (pf' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l)), getLocal cn (getStatelet j l) = getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) -> getStC pf' = getStC pf
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label n : nat_eqType i : state j : state C : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) C' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) pf : n \in nodes |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label n : nat_eqType i : state j : state C : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) C' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) pf : n \in nodes |- Type]
rely_loc' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (i j : state), network_rely w this i j -> getLocal this (getStatelet j l) = getLocal this (getStatelet i l)
getStP_K : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), n \in pts -> getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStP C pf = m
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
Actions.step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
a_step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
locCn : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> valid (getLocal n d) /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (getLocal n d))
getStL_Kp : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
getStL_Kc : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
cohStP : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in pts -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = PStateT
getStL : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> Log
cohStL : forall d : dstatelet, TPCCoh d -> forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> forall l : dynamic id, find log (getLocal n d) = Some l -> dyn_tp l = Log
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
pts_in : forall n : nat_eqType, n \in pts -> n \in nodes
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = getLocal n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
tpc_coh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
localCoh = fun n : nid => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> Pred heap
getStC_K : forall (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal cn d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStC C = m
cn_in = (fun _evar_0_ : (cn \in [:: cn]) || (cn \in pts ++ others) => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (mem_cat cn [:: cn] (pts ++ others))) ((fun _evar_0_ : (cn == cn) || (cn \in pts ++ others) => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : bool => _pattern_value_ || (cn \in pts ++ others)) _evar_0_ (mem_seq1 cn cn)) ((fun _evar_0_ : true || (cn \in pts ++ others) => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : bool => _pattern_value_ || (cn \in pts ++ others)) _evar_0_ (eqxx cn)) is_true_true)) : cn \in nodes

```coq
intros Hn Hpts Hl Hn_in_nodes.
pose proof (getStC_K _ C' pf m l) as HgetStC.
pose proof (getStL_Kp _ _ C pf m l) as HgetStL.
rewrite HgetStC in HgetStL.
rewrite HgetStL.
apply getStCE; auto.
Qed.```

original: intros Hn Hpts Hl Hn_in_nodes. pose proof (getStC_K _ C' pf m l) as HgetStC. pose proof (getStL_Kp _ _ C pf m l) as HgetStL. rewrite HgetStC in HgetStL. rewrite HgetStL. apply getStCE; auto.
